text: Evgeniya Vladimirovna Dobrovolskaya (26 December 1964 – 10 January 2025) was a Soviet-Russian actress. She was honored with the People's Artist of the Russian Federation in 2005, and Golden Eagle Award in 2007.Лауреаты премии «Золотой орёл» на официальном сайте Национальной академии кинематографических искусств и наук России Dobrovolskaya won the Nika Award in 2001.Лауреаты премии «Ника» на официальном сайте Dobrovolskaya was born in Moscow, Russia. Her career began in 1983. Her first movie role was in A Canary Cage. In 2021, Dobrovolskaya was diagnosed with cancer. In December 2024, she was taken to palliative care in Moscow. Dobrovolskaya died on 10 January 2025 from heart failure, aged 60. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Cancer deaths in Russia Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Russian voice actors Category:Actors from Moscow
title: Yevgenia Dobrovolskaya
